item.title: CVE-2022-40310|2024-08-03T12:14:40.080Z -- blaz%20k. -- rate%20my%20post%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20rating%20system%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (subscriber+) Race Condition vulnerability in Rate my Post – WP Rating System plugin <= 3.3.4 at WordPress allows attackers to increase/decrease votes.
